summary: The module supplies utilities for loading and preprocessing graph data used in OGB link prediction benchmarks. It includes a dataset handler that prepares node and edge information, tools to convert raw network files into DGL graph objects, and a component that performs random edge sampling for mini-batch training.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to efficiently train graph neural network models on OGB link prediction datasets by providing ready-to-use data loading, graph construction, and edge sampling mechanisms compatible with PyTorch and DGL.
